General.Name: China Film Co Ltd
General.Description: China Film Co., Ltd. engages in the production, distribution, projection, technology, service, and innovation of films and television dramas in China and internationally. It is involved in the domestic and imported film promotion and distribution; post-film product management; theater investment and management, and theater line operation; film technology research and development; and production, sale, and technical services of film and television equipment, as well as provides ticketing platform and financial leasing services. The company also engages in project investment management; digital film distribution; wholesale of film machinery and related products; animation film production; videotape publishing; cultural brokerage business; film distribution and screening; cultural training; development, import, and export of goods and technologies; and theater management activities. In addition, it offers technology development services; sells projection equipment and digital giant screens; economic and trade consulting services; and sells cinema and film-related equipment. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Beijing, China. China Film Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of China Film Group Corporation.
General.Address: Block E, Huayuan Enterprise Center, Beijing, China, 100044
